summary: REQ-16/17/18 appear implemented: orders now include optional customerName derived from login username and persisted to localStorage; admin Orders panel groups by customer with an "Unknown customer" fallback; admin-only clear-history action uses an in-app AlertDialog confirmation and toast feedback; Shop view sorts products by most-selling using the same orders state with a stable tie-breaker and fallback to original ordering when no orders exist.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/changed general branding and footer content (logo image, "Built with â™¥ using caffeine.ai" link) not requested by REQ-16/17/18.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest focuses only on customer-named order history, clear history action, and most-selling sorting; branding/footer changes are outside scope.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced Toaster/sonner plumbing at the App root (Toaster component) beyond the explicit requirements.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-16/17 mention in-app feedback but do not explicitly require adding a global Toaster; this may be pre-existing, but the diff shows it being added/used at the top level.
